comments.content: You can find these characters on the latin subset of **[KaiTi](http://web.archive.org/web/20140405003233/http:/www.findmyfont.com/index.php/fonts/font-preview?fset=MS-Windows-Fonts&ffam=KaiTi%20-%20Regular&fid=bbfaa12767e15e3f94ea902402527b17&fsize=60&text=kely&fit=1)** (or SimHei) simplified Chinese fonts distributed with several versions of Microsoft Windows.
? I'm not certain you replied to the correct font inquiry.

Yes, I did. Have you clicked on the **[KaiTi link](http://web.archive.org/web/20140405003233/http:/www.findmyfont.com/index.php/fonts/font-preview?fset=MS-Windows-Fonts&ffam=KaiTi%20-%20Regular&fid=bbfaa12767e15e3f94ea902402527b17&fsize=60&text=kely&fit=1)** I gave you above?  
(the kerning is wrong, and it needs some artificial expansion, but otherwise the font exactly matches your sample)
